p: Out of the 11 screened RA patients, 9 were enrolled and received a single intravenous infusion of hUCB‐MSCs (Fig. 2). The cell numbers of hUCB‐MSCs infused to each patient were 2.5 × 10 7 ( n = 3), 5 × 10 7 ( n = 3), and 1 × 10 8 ( n = 3). The study subjects were predominantly female (78%) and the mean age was 57.4 years. The disease duration was (mean ± SD) 9.5 ± 8.7 years and the DAS28 at baseline was 4.53 ± 1.35. All subjects had received MTX, with mean doses of 14.2 mg/week at baseline and seven of them were taking oral corticosteroids (Table 1). No patient had previously received biologic DMARDs.
